headline: AdvaMed names Jake Leach as chair of diabetes sector

headline: Is Abbott Laboratories (ABT) Pricing Reflect Long Term Value After Recent Share Price Weakness
summary: If you are wondering whether Abbott Laboratories is attractively priced or just fairly valued at current levels, you are not alone. This article will help you put the current share price in context. The stock last closed at US$115.29, with returns of 2.3% over 7 days and 7.3% over 30 days, while year to date and 1 year returns are a 7.2% decline and a 13.0% decline respectively. Recent attention on Abbott has centered on broader healthcare sector sentiment and how large, diversified medical...

headline: Russia's war on Ukraine puts women off having children — and that could spell economic disaster
summary: Four years of war have discouraged Ukrainian and Russian women from having children, and that could impact their economies in the future.
